solution_line_template: If 1 carton contains {boxes_per_carton} boxes, then a dozen cartons contain {boxes_per_carton}*{dozen_cartons} = {total_boxes_in_dozen_cartons} boxes

If 1 box has {packs_per_box} packs of cookies, then {total_boxes_in_dozen_cartons} boxes have {total_boxes_in_dozen_cartons}*{packs_per_box} = <<{total_boxes_in_dozen_cartons}*{packs_per_box}={total_packs_in_dozen_cartons}>>{total_packs_in_dozen_cartons} packs

If a dozen cartons cost ${cost_of_dozen_cartons} and contain {total_packs_in_dozen_cartons} packs of cookies, then each pack costs {cost_of_dozen_cartons}/{total_packs_in_dozen_cartons} = $<<{cost_of_dozen_cartons}/{total_packs_in_dozen_cartons}={price_per_pack}>>{price_per_pack}
